sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_tag ( id char(32) not null, tagmark int not null, tagtext varchar(32) not null, suggest bit not null, frequency int not null, views int not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(tagmark) );
create table sf_tagr ( id char(32) not null, tagid char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, primary key(id), unique(tagid, contentid) );
create table sf_tag_synonyms ( id char(32) not null, tagfrom char(32) not null, tagto char(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id), unique(tagfrom, tagto) );
